domain.interfaces
Interface Actionable

All Known Subinterfaces:
FiredActionable, Reactable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AIControlled, Menu, Player, UserControlled
public interface Actionable

This abstract interface define the generic model that an Actionable instance will have. A class wich implements one of it's subinterfaces will be able to manage Action instances.

Method Detail

getActionableName

java.lang.String getActionableName()
Returns:
The Actionable name.

getActions

java.util.ArrayList<Action> getActions()
Returns:
An ArrayList containing the Action instances that an Actionable have implemented.

processAction

void processAction(Action action)
Parameters:
action - The action to be executed. The easiest way of implementing this contract method is calling the action.executeAction()
See Also:
Action.executeAction()

addAction

void addAction(Action action)
Parameters:
action - The action to be added to an ArrayList containing the multiple Action instances that an Actionable implements.
